item.title: Audio From Scratch With Go: stereo panning
item.description: In the previous post we have written code to change the amplitude of wave files. Now we’ll take a look at how we can turn a mono wave file into a stereo wave file with an optional panning, and explore how this is represented internally by the WAVE file format. Channels The raw audio data inside a WAVE file consists of multiple frames. For now, we have called them ‘samples’ although that is strictly speaking not entirely correct.
